entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
